review_text:
To be honest, it was all a bit confusing; I really didn't think it would be like an analogy story, I'd thought it would be one of those films where some of the characters are someway connected to one another. 
At least extend each of the stories more!
And I would've thought there would've been some sex scenes with Maggie Q!

It was poignant though, but I wished it wasn't so confusing for me!
